author: joe_veneroso
post: If John has an i Phone, he can do a Google Search for “Shroud images.” Once he clicks on the one he wants, he puts his curse on it and double clicks. This should give him the option to “Save image to Photo Album.” Also an arrow and square on the bottom indicates ability to post to social media. If he clicks that, he’ll have the option to post on Facebook, Twitter or Flickr as well as send to others via email, SMS or Air Drop..
